posts.title: Understanding Neural Network Weights Through Visualization
posts.excerpt: Struggling with understanding how weights work in neural networks? I've created a Streamlit app that visualizes neural network weights as layers of valves, helping you understand how weight adjustments affect the network's output.

posts.title: 5 AM Thoughts: Building a Writing Prompt Generator
posts.excerpt: Yet again, it's 5 am, and I'm working on another tool - this time a writing prompt generator using Microsoft's phi-4-128k-instruct model to help overcome writer's block.

posts.title: Making Sense of LSTM Hyperparameters Through Interactive Visualization
posts.excerpt: When I started my machine learning journey, hyperparameters felt like abstract, intangible concepts. I've created an interactive LSTM model that helps visualize how different hyperparameter values affect model training.
